pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ciso[![Tests](https://github.com/ioos/ciso/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ioos/ciso/actions/workflows/tests.yml)[![Wheels](https://github.com/ioos/ciso/actions/workflows/cibuildwheel.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ioos/ciso/actions/workflows/cibuildwheel.yml)Fast cythonized code for iso-slices of ocean models properties.
